en.title: Municipal Corporation Dummy Voting Machine
en.demoInstruction: For demo voting press the blue button in front of candidate name and symbol
en.candidateList: Candidate List: A - Rohit Anil Gade, B - Vandana Suresh Borade, C - Ratna Ashok Satbhai, D - Yogesh Chindhuji Nisal
en.voteThem: Vote them in by a huge margin by clicking the button!
en.thankYou: Thank you for participating in the Municipal Corporation Dummy Election
en.instruction1: тАв Click the 'Press Button' to vote for each candidate one by one
en.instruction2: тАв You will hear a confirmation beep after each vote
en.instruction3: тАв After voting for all candidates, you can vote for NOTA
en.instruction4: тАв When completed, you will hear completion sound
en.instruction5: тАв Use the 'Reset & Vote Again' button to restart the voting process
en.clickToVote: Click the 'Press Button' in front of candidate to cast your vote
en.finalStepDesc: Click the button to select NOTA if you don't want to vote for any candidate
en.completedMessage: тЬЕ Your vote has been successfully submitted. Thank you!
